name: Immune Attack (MelanieAnns)
description:
Designed, Developed and Evaluated for learning outcomes by the Learning Technologies Program at the Federation of American Scientists.  Funded by a major grant from the National Science Foundation.   All the code, art, sound and voices are by Garry and Melissa Gaber of escape hatch entertainment.

This game was evaluated for its effectiveness in teaching molecular cell biology to 6th - 12th grade students by me, Melanie Stegman, PhD, while I lead the project at the Federation of American Scientists.  The evaluation was funded by a major grant from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases/National (US) Institutes of Health.  You can read our papers here: MolecularJig.com/reearch

----Continued support and love for this  game comes from me, Melanie Stegman and Molecular Jig Games, LLC.  Please enjoy!!  Tell your friends and teachers!

PC  only.  Do not use a game controller!  You will need a two button mouse, or amazingly excellent trackpad skills            FAQ   for   HELP   here.

Want more games like this?  You might donate when you grab my other game, Immune Defense.  Or find us on Twitter @MolecularJig and online at MolecularJig.com. We love your feedback and support! Lots more science games at ScienceGameCenter.org.
